description: Preferred dependencies and versions
---

# Preferred Library Versions
- [requests](https://requests.readthedocs.io/)>=2.32.3: HTTP requests
- [beautifulsoup4](https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/)>=4.12.3: HTML parsing
- [lxml](https://lxml.de/)>=5.3.0: XML/HTML parser
- [pytest](https://docs.pytest.org/)>=8.3.3: Testing framework
- [pytest-cov](https://pytest-cov.readthedocs.io/)>=5.0.0: Coverage reporting
- [pytest-mock](https://pytest-mock.readthedocs.io/)>=3.14.0: Mocking utilities
- [black](https://black.readthedocs.io/)>=24.10.0: Code formatting
- [isort](https://pycqa.github.io/isort/)>=5.13.2: Import sorting
- [mypy](https://mypy.readthedocs.io/)>=1.13.0: Type checking
- [flake8](https://flake8.pycqa.org/)>=7.1.0: Linting
- [pre-commit](https://pre-commit.com/)>=4.0.1: Git hooks

# Preferred Standard Libraries
- sqlite3: Database operations
- argparse: CLI argument parsing
- logging: Logging

# Preferred Node.js Versions
- [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows)>=1.2.2: Node Version Manager for Windows
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/)>=22.0.0: JavaScript runtime
- [cspell](https://cspell.org/)>=9.0.0: Spell checker for code

# Requirements File
- Maintain `pyproject.toml` for runtime and development dependencies
- Synchronize `pyproject.toml` and `04-02.dependencies.instructions.md` on version updates
